name: Dino-Brunch
description: Welcome to Dino-Brunch! You (or you and your friend) control 2 dinosaurus companions (w,a,s,d/arrow keys) who have been put in a maze. Your goal is to get to the eggs safely, whilst bringing along food for the dino in the egg. But beware because jump is binded to "space" on both players! Try your best and have fun!
